qas.question: Which long time judge decided to leave his position at the end of the season?
How many seasons was Mariah Carey a judge on American Idol?
Who announced this would be his final year as a judge?
Who were the other judges to leave after this season?

context: Towards the end of the season, <a0_0><a2_0>Randy Jackson<a2_0/><a0_0/>, the last remaining of the original judges, announced that he would no longer serve as a judge to pursue other business ventures. Both judges <a3_0>Mariah Carey and Nicki Minaj<a3_0/> also decided to leave after <a1_0>one<a1_0/> season to focus on their music careers.
